Comment: This is the gambit move. It's not a "pure" Krejcik, which properly arises after 1. d4 f5  2. g4, so perhaps this specific configuration should be called the Krejcik Gambit System or (pardon the shameless self-promotion) the "Avocet Gambit."  ;-)
